channel.title: Any way u can add quickchat
channel.description: I'm using project insanity Is there a code that when you click on a skill it will like quick chat it. Right now if you click on the skill it will let you set the level and i wanna change that. If there is any code for the actionbuttons plz post below.

item.title: Any way u can add quickchat
item.dc:creator: @chri55w chri55w
item.description:
@chri55w wrote:

litterally just 2 seconds ago posted this lol

find the action button for each skill id and set what you want each one to do

if it allows you to setlevel from it you will want to delete that part or you will get duplicate case error

then for each button add something like this:

case 33206: c.forcedText = "[Quick Chat] My Attack level is " + c.playerLevel[0] + "."; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break;
should be able to figure it out from this

Read full topic
